feed.title: Provisions (was: PSA: Taproot loss of quantum protections)

entry.title: Provisions (was: PSA: Taproot loss of quantum protections)
entry.summary: The sender of the message has informed Andrew and ZmnSCPxj that they have reviewed the resources provided to them. They have focused on Proof of assets as a part of their zero-knowledge proof learning exercise. The sender is unsure if Jonas Nick code qualifies as a use of Taproot since the Taproot's role there is only to provide public keys for the anonymity set. However, the sender enjoys discovering new things and being a humble part of the community.
